summary: Set in post war Romania, a communist who was tortured by the fascists during the war is now a police detective and sets about clearing his city of gangsters and black marketeers.
cast: Ilarion Ciobanu|Alexandru Dobrescu|Sergiu Nicolaescu|Gheorghe Dinica|George Constantin|Stefan Mihailescu-Braila|Sebastian Papaiani|Aimee Iacobescu|Monica Ghiuta|Corina Chiriac|Mariam Barry Dialo|Emanoil Petrut|Chiril Economu|Mihai Mereuta|Dorin Dron|Corneliu Gîrbea|Jean Lorin Florescu|Petre Tanasievici|Constantin Lungeanu|Mircea Pascu|Jean Reder|Alexandru Lungu|Stelian Cremenciuc|Alexandru Manea|Nita Anastase|Arcadie Donos|Alexandru Azoitei|Dinu Gherasim|Paul Rusca|Alexandru Riosanu|Gheorghe Mazilu|Dumitru Dumitru|Mihai Adrian|Miron Murea|Vinicius Stinghe|Nicolae Dolea|Andrei Bursaci|Alexandru Morariu|Dumitru Ghiuzelea|Adrian Stefanescu|Tudor Stavru|Ion Polizache|Ion Apahideanu|Adrian Mihai|Vasile Popa|Florin Scarlatescu|Cristian Sofron|Raluca Zamfirescu
title: Cu mâinile curate
